mapper.sql: SELECT id, action, module, detail, user_id, user_guid, account, ip_address, device_model, os, browser, created_at FROM operation_logs

where.if: AND ( account LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR user_guid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR module LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ip_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR device_model LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR os LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR browser LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )

mapper.select: ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operation_logs ( action, module, detail, user_id, user_guid, account, ip_address, device_model, os, browser, created_at ) VALUES ( #{action}, #{module}, #{detail}, #{userId}, #{userGuid}, #{account}, #{ipAddress}, #{deviceModel}, #{os}, #{browser}, #{createdAt} )
